IMPA_CD like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_KO like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or DESCRIPTION like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_EN like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_SP like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_JP like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_CN like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_RS like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item
IMPA_CD like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_KO like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or DESCRIPTION like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_EN like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_SP like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_JP like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_CN like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or ITEM_NM_RS like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')

WITH RECURSIVE cte AS ( SELECT LVL1_CD, LVL2_CD, LVL3_CD, LVL4_CD, 1 AS item_level FROM item WHERE LVL1_CD = #{LVL1_CD} UNION all SELECT a.LVL1_CD, a.LVL2_CD, a.LVL3_CD, a.LVL4_CD, b.item_level + 1 FROM item AS a INNER JOIN cte AS b ON a.LVL1_CD = b.LVL2_CD ) SELECT DISTINCT LVL1_CD, LVL2_CD, LVL3_CD, LVL4_CD, item_level FROM cte;
